entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
